title: The Kite Runner
author: Khaled Hosseini
synopsis: An emotional tale of friendship, betrayal, and redemption set in Afghanistan before and after the Soviet invasion.

title: 12 Rules for Life
author: Jordan B. Peterson
synopsis: A practical and philosophical guide to finding meaning in life and dealing with daily challenges.

title: Verity
author: Colleen Hoover
synopsis: A writer uncovers disturbing secrets while working on another author's biography.

title: Planet of the Apes
author: Pierre Boulle
synopsis: A science fiction classic exploring a society where apes dominate humans.

title: I Am Legend
author: Richard Matheson
synopsis: A man struggles to survive in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by vampires.

title: Dark Matter
author: Blake Crouch
synopsis: A fascinating story about choices, parallel universes, and what truly matters in life.

title: Recursion
author: Blake Crouch
synopsis: A journey that explores memory, time, and the implications of altering the past.

title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
author: Arthur C. Clarke
synopsis: A groundbreaking tale of humanity's journey to the stars and the mysteries of a monolith influencing human evolution.

title: The Gods Themselves
author: Isaac Asimov
synopsis: A story about an energy transfer process that threatens to destroy Earth, involving humans and alien beings from another universe.

title: Dracula
author: Bram Stoker
synopsis: The classic tale of Count Dracula's attempt to spread his undead curse to Victorian England.

title: The Wonderful Wizard of Oz
author: L. Frank Baum
synopsis: The story of Dorothy, a young girl transported to the magical land of Oz, who embarks on a journey to meet the Wizard and find her way home.

title: Les Misérables
author: Victor Hugo
synopsis: A sweeping tale of redemption and justice, following the lives of Jean Valjean and other characters in 19th-century France.

title: Alice's Adventures in Wonderland
author: Lewis Carroll
synopsis: The whimsical adventure of Alice, who falls into a rabbit hole and discovers a strange world filled with peculiar characters.

title: Sem Asas ao Amanhecer
author: Tânia Souza
synopsis: A touching narrative about self-discovery and resilience in the face of life's challenges.
